uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.relationship

Class GlobalRoleFilter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.model.relationship.GlobalRoleFilter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseFilter<T>, BinaryFilter<T>, Targetted<T>

    public class GlobalRoleFilter<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements BinaryFilter<T>
    An AcceptFilter that accepts or rejects all targets based on whether the current user possesses a global role. This can be used to map global roles (such as Admin) into the filter returned by a AccessRoleProvider.
    Author:
    spb
